Interface IMyApplicationListener

All Superinterfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, IGraphic
All Known Implementing Classes:
TileMapGrafica2D
public interface IMyApplicationListener extends IGraphic, com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
Interfaz que se extiende de IGraphic (propia del modelo del King Valley, no existe dependencia ni acoplamiento con LibGDX) y ApplicationListener (Propia de LibGDX)
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri
